body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following items does not belong to the category described by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Well done! 蔬菜 shūcài means “vegetable,” and the only item in the choices that is not a vegetable is 橙子 chéngzi (oranges).
body.incorrect: So close! Review all four items in the choices and think about what they represent.

body.quiz: Which of the following can the word in the audio relate to?
body.correct: Wonderfully done! 苹果 píngguǒ means “apple,” and it’s one of the most popular fruits.
body.incorrect: Not quite… listen again several times and think about what it represents.

body.quiz: Which of the following colors best describes the item in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 绿色 lǜsè
options: Audio for 蓝色 lánsè
Audio for 红色 hóngsè
Audio for 黑色 hēisè
body.correct: You got it! 西兰花 xīlánhuā means broccoli, and it’s commonly a green color.
body.incorrect: Oops… listen to the audio several more times and think about what it represents.
